value.title: Roche, Microsoft Partner Improve Healthcare using AI and Cloud Technology
value.excerpt: Roche and Microsoft, global leaders in the health and technology sectors, respectively, have signed a MoU to to improve healthcare

value.title: Ameca the robot is more human (and haunting) than I ever imagined
value.excerpt: If you poke a robot in the face, is it going to try to kill you?  Interviewing Ameca the robot during a demo at CES, I got my answer: No, but the face it makes when you get up in its personal space is haunting and mesmerizing in equal measure.

value.title: Google Prediction Framework addresses data pipeline drudgery
value.excerpt: Framework weaves together Google Cloud Platform services to simplify the implementation of prediction projects.

value.title: Cadillac’s new self-driving concept is a luxury loveseat on wheels
value.excerpt: The InnerSpace concept looks like a futuristic car from the outside—but inside, there's a two-seat loveseat surrounded by one of the widest screens we've ever seen, and no steering wheel or pedals.

value.title: MVP versus EVP: Is it time to introduce ethics into the agile startup model?
value.excerpt: Rather than developing a minimum viable product (MVP), companies should develop and roll out an ethically viable product (EVP) based on responsible artificial intelligence (RAI).

value.title: How Wix empowers customer care with AI capabilities using Amazon Transcribe
value.excerpt: With over 200 million users worldwide, Wix is a leading cloud-based development platform for building fully personalized, high-quality websites. value.title: As third-party cookies fade, the cold start problem becomes an opportunity
value.excerpt: The demise of the third-party cookie could transform the cold start problem into an opportunity for businesses and their customers.

value.title: Ecovacs’ new Deebot X1 cleans your home and itself

value.title: Deploying ML models using SageMaker Serverless Inference (Preview)
value.excerpt: Amazon SageMaker Serverless Inference (Preview) was recently announced at re:Invent 2021 as a new model hosting feature that lets customers serve model predictions without having to explicitly provision compute instances or configure scaling policies to handle traffic variations. value.title: Volvo will debut its 'self-driving' Ride Pilot feature in California
value.excerpt: Volvo will debut “Ride Pilot,” its take on a Tesla-like autonomous driving feature, in California, the automaker announced on Wednesday during CES 2022..

value.title: Australian man plans to marry robot after failing to find loving woman

value.title: Qualcomm and Microsoft collaborate on custom chips for AR glasses

value.title: Restaurant Robotics Shift to Customer-Facing Roles
value.excerpt: As labor challenges persist, restaurants are looking for solutions, and some tech companies are looking to bring robotics into customer-service roles.

value.title: Sensory Sticks Its Head in the Cloud with AWS, NVIDIA-Powered SensoryCloud AI-as-a-Service
value.excerpt: Aims to offer key AI services, like facial recognition and speech-to-text, for any internet-connected device via a simple API.

value.title: CES 2022: AI is driving innovation in ‘smart’ tech
value.excerpt: At CES 2022, a slew of smart tech innovations driven by AI and aimed at improving lives and businesses, are being unveiled publicly.

value.title: VA Turns to AI to Streamline Administrative Tasks
value.excerpt: The Department of Veterans Affairs is exploring how to use artificial intelligence tools to drive efficiencies in a wide range of medical and clerical areas.

value.title: 2022 Startup Predictions: The Trends, Sectors, And Tech Worth Watching
value.excerpt: Will 2022 be another record year for investment into the European venture community? Here are a few of the trends and technologies likely to drive investment decisions in the year ahead.

value.title: Hong Kong Billionaire Professor Adds $2 Billion To His Wealth As Shares Of AI Giant SenseTime Soar
value.excerpt: Shares of SenseTime have almost doubled since its closely watched IPO last week, adding $2 billion to the net worth of Tang Xiao’ou, cofounder and the largest shareholder of the Chinese AI giant.

value.title: Anker shows off the tiniest 100W charger we’ve ever seen and more at CES 2022
value.excerpt: Anker just announced the 736 Nano II Charger at CES 2022, along with a bunch of other products spanning the projector, webcam, and smart home categories.

value.title: Accelerate the in-vehicle digital experience with Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft is helping to reshape the automotive industry in the way it serves its drivers with in-vehicle infotainment systems.
